body: this is the first season its called my stepmoms plan. second season will come but cant say when. well the stepmom was able to get what she wanted i think in second season mc will expose her coz she is an ex-mafia or something she is just playing a role of perfect housewife but she is a snake. hope mc know the truth and make her his bitch
